nodes.bodyText: This class makes my brain hurt. The code is working but it could be made more readable, and the javadoc could use an update.
Don't you have the filter names reversed? X509Filter is doing authentication, the ApimlX509AuthenticationFilter is not doing authentication and yet the name suggests that.
